name: Rumble (itch) (Pancake)
description:
In this 1-bit game, you have to type the words displayed on the screen.

The goal of the game is to finish all levels or just to play in the endless mode and get the highest score possible. 

Game contents
   - 50 Levels
   - Endless mode
   - 3 Letter mechanics
   - Speed mode (Yellow colour shift)
